content: SeedlyTV EP02 Credit Card Miles Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Apr 2019Do you recommend to redeem a business class ticket or to purchase an economy ticket then to upgrade to business class with miles ?1 answerAnswerBump1

Aaron Wong, Founder at The MilelionLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 10 Apr 2019Redeem Business Class. Upgrading Economy tickets is completely not worth it. Read more--  https://milelion.com/2019/02/21/the-ultimate-guide-to-upgrading-singapore-airlines-tickets-with-krisflyer-miles/0 comments2
